name: Operator Simulator
description:
Take the role of an operator in this short text-based puzzle game.

Unfortunately, I learned last minute that WebGL requires additional work to support Unicode. Since one of the puzzles requires it, I have not uploaded a web version of the game but desktop should work fine. I apologize for any inconvenience.

Made for Xanderjam #3 2021. The theme was "evolution".

https://itch.io/jam/xanderjam-3-spring-jam

Changelog:

1.1

  • Fixed UI so it's no longer for QHD; should now work for both 16:9 and 16:10 aspect ratios
